sen.j: 蘆名 盛政（あしな もりまさ、1386年（元中3年/至徳 (日本)3年）- 1434年（永享6年））は、室町時代前・中期の武将。
sen.e: Morimasa ASHINA (1386 - 1434) was a busho (Japanese military commander) in the early and mid Muromachi Period.

sen.e: After becoming the family head, he tried to strengthen the relationship with temple and shrine powers by donating his territories in order to solidify his position.

sen.e: However, in 1418, the dissatisfaction against this made his family the Shingu clan betray Morimasa, and they engaged in conflicts and disputes.

sen.e: Morimasa put down the insurgency by taking control of Kobuse-jo Castle in the following year, 1419.
